document_name: Signed Prodoc Signature Page - CC MONRE-MARD.pdf

outputs.output_descr:
Outcome 1  Climate change policy formulated and mainstreamed into the National Target Program to respond to Climate Change, related action plans formulated, and policy and management capacities for roll out strengthened.

Outcome 2 - Improved knowledge base, and national research capacity strengthened to deliver analysis for evidence-based planning and policy development, and implementation of climate change related measures to support sectors and provinces in rolling out the National Target Programme to respond to climate change.

Outcome 3 - Build capacities for regulation, guidance, local policy measures, and project management, and formulate concrete regulations, policy measures and investment plans for climate change adaptation and green house gases emissions control.

Support to Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development with the following outcomes:
Outcome 1  Climate change policy formulated and mainstreamed into the National Target Program to respond to Climate Change, related action plans formulated, and policy and management capacities for roll out strengthened.

Outcome 2 - Improved knowledge base, and national research capacity strengthened to deliver analysis for evidence-based planning and policy development, and implementation of climate change related measures to support sectors and provinces in rolling out the National Target Programme to respond to climate change .

Outcome 3 - Build capacities for regulation, guidance, local policy measures, and project management, and formulate concrete regulations, policy measures and investment plans for climate change adaptation and Green House Gases emissions control.
 in analysis of  risks,formulation of climate change policies, and analysis of green house gases emission, formulation of investment plans toward low carbon economic development.

project_descr: Strengthening national capacities to respond to climate change in Vietnam, reducing vulnerability and controlling GHG emissions
